## arth-lib-base package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Decimal](./arth-lib-base.decimal.md) | Fixed-point decimal bignumber with 18 digits of precision. |
|  [Fees](./arth-lib-base.fees.md) | Calculator for fees. |
|  [LiquityStore](./arth-lib-base.liquitystore.md) | Abstract base class of Liquity data store implementations. |
|  [StabilityDeposit](./arth-lib-base.stabilitydeposit.md) | A Stability Deposit and its accrued gains. |
|  [TransactionFailedError](./arth-lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) | Thrown by [TransactableLiquity](./arth-lib-base.transactableliquity.md) functions in case of transaction failure. |
|  [Trove](./arth-lib-base.trove.md) | A combination of collateral and debt. |
|  [TroveWithPendingRedistribution](./arth-lib-base.trovewithpendingredistribution.md) | A Trove in its state after the last direct modification. |
|  [UserTrove](./arth-lib-base.usertrove.md) | A Trove that is associated with a single owner. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CRITICAL\_COLLATERAL\_RATIO](./arth-lib-base.critical_collateral_ratio.md) | Total collateral ratio below which recovery mode is triggered. |
|  [LUSD\_LIQUIDATION\_RESERVE](./arth-lib-base.lusd_liquidation_reserve.md) | Amount of LUSD that's reserved for compensating the liquidator of a Trove. |
|  [LUSD\_MINIMUM\_DEBT](./arth-lib-base.lusd_minimum_debt.md) | A Trove must always have at least this much debt. |
|  [LUSD\_MINIMUM\_NET\_DEBT](./arth-lib-base.lusd_minimum_net_debt.md) | A Trove must always have at least this much debt on top of the [liquidation reserve](./arth-lib-base.lusd_liquidation_reserve.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [MAXIMUM\_BORROWING\_RATE](./arth-lib-base.maximum_borrowing_rate.md) | Value that the [borrowing rate](./arth-lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md) will never exceed. |
|  [MINIMUM\_BORROWING\_RATE](./arth-lib-base.minimum_borrowing_rate.md) | Value that the [borrowing rate](./arth-lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md) will never decay below. |
|  [MINIMUM\_COLLATERAL\_RATIO](./arth-lib-base.minimum_collateral_ratio.md) | Collateral ratio below which a Trove can be liquidated in normal mode. |
|  [MINIMUM\_REDEMPTION\_RATE](./arth-lib-base.minimum_redemption_rate.md) | Value that the [redemption rate](./arth-lib-base.fees.redemptionrate.md) will never decay below. |

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Decimalish](./arth-lib-base.decimalish.md) | Types that can be converted into a Decimal. |

|  [MinedReceipt](./arth-lib-base.minedreceipt.md) | Either a [FailedReceipt](./arth-lib-base.failedreceipt.md) or a [SuccessfulReceipt](./arth-lib-base.successfulreceipt.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [PendingReceipt](./arth-lib-base.pendingreceipt.md) | Indicates that the transaction hasn't been mined yet. |
|  [StabilityDepositChange](./arth-lib-base.stabilitydepositchange.md) | Represents the change between two Stability Deposit states. |
|  [SuccessfulReceipt](./arth-lib-base.successfulreceipt.md) | Indicates that the transaction has succeeded. |
|  [TroveAdjustmentParams](./arth-lib-base.troveadjustmentparams.md) | Parameters of an [adjustTrove()](./arth-lib-base.transactableliquity.adjusttrove.md) transaction. |
|  [TroveChange](./arth-lib-base.trovechange.md) | Represents the change between two Trove states. |
|  [TroveClosureParams](./arth-lib-base.troveclosureparams.md) | Parameters of a [closeTrove()](./arth-lib-base.transactableliquity.closetrove.md) transaction. |
|  [TroveCreationError](./arth-lib-base.trovecreationerror.md) | Describes why a Trove could not be created. |
|  [TroveCreationParams](./arth-lib-base.trovecreationparams.md) | Parameters of an [openTrove()](./arth-lib-base.transactableliquity.opentrove.md) transaction. |
|  [UserTroveStatus](./arth-lib-base.usertrovestatus.md) | Represents whether a UserTrove is open or not, or why it was closed. |
